context: <user> I need a train to go from Cambridge to Norwich. <system> What day of the week are you looking to travel? <user> I am traveling on Sunday <system> What time would you like to leave or arrive by? <user> I would like to arrive by 13:45. <system> I have the TR7438 that will arrive at 12:55. Would you like a booking made today? <user> I would like to book that train for 4 people please. <system> 7G6OJ8G2 is your confirmation code. May I help you further?<user> yeah, I'm also looking for a place to stay. I don't like hotels, so a guesthouse would be better. Moderate in price. <system> There are several moderate priced guesthouses do you have a preferred area that you want to stay in?<user> Yes, the hotel should be in the east and doesnt need to have free parking. <system> a and b guest house is a guesthouse in the east and it is moderate. Shall I book it ?<user> can I have the star rating and idf they have wi fi ? <system> The star rating is 4 and they do have free wifi.<user> OK, that's all I need for now. Thanks. <system> Great. I hope you have an excellent day.<user> Thanks you too Goodbye <system>
